name: Project Wander
info: Final Project. Hiking app letting the user upload, like and bookmark trails all over the world. Built around Google map's API.

name: Newsroom Challenge
info: Front end challenge for a news conglomerate client. News platform translated in both english and swedish.

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
info: Web-based application of the popular game 'Rock, Paper, Scissors' where the user plays against a computer through randomized outputs.

name: Midcourse Project
info: Monolith cooking app using third party API. Receive recipes based on what's in you fridge.

name: Cooper Challenge
info: Cooper Test Calulator with result chart. First time exploring the correlation between React and Ruby on Rails.

name: Adress Book Challenge
info: One of my first projects. Add contacts in an adress book built in vanilla JavaScript.

name: ATM Challenge
info: My first Ruby project while attending a coding bootcamp. Basic ruby based project tested with RSpec.
